questions.question: Why was the race difficult for the children?
questions.answer: It was because they got lost.

questions.question: Why didn't the children take a taxi to the hotel?
questions.answer: They didn't take a taxi to the hotel because it was against the rules.

questions.question: What are the two options for the children to get to the hotel?
questions.answer: They can walk or take the bus.

questions.question: What is your favourite type of transport? Why?
questions.answer: My favourite type of transport is taking a taxi because it is fast.
